# DO NOT EDIT THIS FILE! THIS FILE IS AUTOMATICALLY GENERATED BY xml2cmake
PROJECT(Nek5000_database)

ADD_DATABASE_CODE_GEN_TARGETS(Nek5000)

SET(COMMON_SOURCES
Nek5000PluginInfo.C
Nek5000CommonPluginInfo.C
)

SET(LIBI_SOURCES
Nek5000PluginInfo.C
)

SET(LIBM_SOURCES
Nek5000MDServerPluginInfo.C
${COMMON_SOURCES}
avtNek5000FileFormat.C
avtNek5000Options.C
)

SET(LIBE_SOURCES
Nek5000EnginePluginInfo.C
${COMMON_SOURCES}
avtNek5000FileFormat.C
avtNek5000Options.C
)

INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES(
${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}
${VISIT_DATABASE_INCLUDES}
)

LINK_DIRECTORIES(${VISIT_LIBRARY_DIR} )

ADD_LIBRARY(INek5000Database ${LIBI_SOURCES})
TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(INek5000Database visitcommon)
SET(INSTALLTARGETS INek5000Database)

IF(NOT VISIT_ENGINE_ONLY AND NOT VISIT_DBIO_ONLY)
    ADD_LIBRARY(MNek5000Database ${LIBM_SOURCES})
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(MNek5000Database visitcommon avtdbatts avtdatabase_ser )
    ADD_TARGET_DEFINITIONS(MNek5000Database MDSERVER)
    SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} MNek5000Database)
ENDIF(NOT VISIT_ENGINE_ONLY AND NOT VISIT_DBIO_ONLY)

ADD_LIBRARY(ENek5000Database_ser ${LIBE_SOURCES})
TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(ENek5000Database_ser visitcommon avtpipeline_ser avtdatabase_ser )
ADD_TARGET_DEFINITIONS(ENek5000Database_ser ENGINE)
SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} ENek5000Database_ser)

IF(VISIT_PARALLEL)
    ADD_PARALLEL_LIBRARY(ENek5000Database_par ${LIBE_SOURCES})
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(ENek5000Database_par visitcommon avtpipeline_par avtdatabase_par )
    ADD_TARGET_DEFINITIONS(ENek5000Database_par ENGINE)
    SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} ENek5000Database_par)
ENDIF(VISIT_PARALLEL)

VISIT_INSTALL_DATABASE_PLUGINS(${INSTALLTARGETS})
VISIT_PLUGIN_TARGET_OUTPUT_DIR(databases ${INSTALLTARGETS})
VISIT_PLUGIN_TARGET_FOLDER(databases Nek5000 ${INSTALLTARGETS})
